column1: The Purple Pig////Pros: Food was outstanding
column2: definitely 5 stars for their fantastic flavors
column3: the reason I gave it 3 stars is outlined under cons
column4: below. I had the butternut squash soup and the corn bread. Both were a thing of dreams
column6: the cornbread sweet and salty with nice chunks of cheese
column7: honestly the food is all it is talked up to be.
